About Me

A brief summary...

BIO

I'm currently a fourth-year management student studying in the Rotman Commerce program at the University of Toronto. In my free time, I'm learning Front-End Web Development with freeCodeCamp and various other resources. I love entrepreneurship and startup culture and am extremely passionate in becoming a developer.

Work Experience:

Braze Mobility

During the start of 2018, I worked at Braze Mobility as a Marketing and Business Development Intern.

Volunteer Experience:

Various

Ever since I turned 10 years old I began volunteering at my first event with my family. Since then, I have volunteered with over 50 charitable organizations such as WWF, Easter Seals Canada, and Habitat for Hummanity to name a few.

Interests:

Guitar, Boxing, Rubik's Cube

In my free time I enjoy practicing acoustic guitar specifically fingerstyle songs. At UofT I joined the boxing club and regularly attend Rotman Commerce events. Occasionally, I like to solve the rubik's cube among other interesting toys.
